body.name: Portable Seat Cushion for Office Soft Memory Foam Seat Cushion Non Slip Bottom with Carry Handle,Washable Cover，Comfortable Coccyx Cushion for Home Office Chair Pad，Car Seat, Wheelchair (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 35 mins
features: ✔High Quality Memory Foam： We understand the importance and impact of your comfort and well-being during your daily activities, whether in the office, car, or even on your wheelchair. This Seat cushion is made of high-density comfortable memory cotton, which can provide you with maximum comfort and support while you have to sit for a long period . The bottom of the cushion is made of PU leather, which makes it look fantastic.

✔ Comfortable Design：Hard seats can be very uncomfortable and cause tailbone pressure if you have to sit for a long period.This seat cushion is firm enough to support you and soft enough to be comfortable, will support your whole body while sitting. Each premium comfortable seat cushion is 16.1”X16.1”X2.3”, to fit a variety of seats.

✔Portable&Easy Care：With the carry handle, the lightweight seat cushion is easier to carry and perfect for travelling. The cover is removable for easy cleaning.Just wash the cover in warm water ,you can always have the new seat cushion.
✔Stay glued to your seat: Featuring an all-over rubberized, non-slip base, the memory foam pillow offers secure positioning to make sure you are safely seated in one place.

✔VERSATILE: Whether as a desk chair cushion, for home office computer chair cushion, seat cushion for office chair or wheelchair seat cushion, there are no limits to using this ergonomic chair cushion for lower back pain relief. Use the coccyx cushion as a stadium seat cushion or make your trip more pleasant by using it as a car seat pillow, seat cushion for driving by train or an airplane seat cushion.
body.description: Memory foam base is covered with an internal cover and they are placed in a luxury removable machine washable black plush velour cover Covers are waterproof for easy cleaning and safe for washing on low settings; Drying on low heat or Air drying is recommended Memory Foam Cushion is designed to provide therapeutic comfort for sitting, even for prolonged periods of time Featuring an all-over rubberized, non-slip base, the memory foam pillow offers secure positioning to make sure you are safely seated in one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: After my back injury I needed a cushion for my desk chair, but didn't want one that was too thick since it made the height adjustment of the seat vs. the arms difficult. The approximately 2" thickness of this cushion is plenty. It is comfortable and the non-slip underside keeps it in the chair (I also scoot the cushion against the chair back).The rear side of the cushion does not seem to be contoured as described, and there are no straps or tabs to fasten it to the chair, but those things aren't deal-breakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has been a good product so far. I have only used it for one day so far but have a desk job for work so sat on it for at least 7 hours. It is memory foam and smells as such. I’m hoping the normal memory foam smell will go away soon. The size is good for me but some may say it needs to be a little wider. Not bad for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's easily portable.
reviews.reviewText: It works for what I need it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not memory foam.
reviews.reviewText: The cushion is nice, but it is NOT memory foam as claimed. It is just normal foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definite Score on this Won
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a long flight and it was comfortable and easy to transport. Very good quality. Now that my trip is over, I'm using it my desk chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I specifically purchased this seat cushion for a five hour flight from California to Maryland. The previous flight was unbearable for my bottom. The airplane seats were so hard or without the right amount of cushioning that I was in agony. I had to keep shifting in my seat. My hemorrhoids were inflamed by the uncomfortable seat. Sorry for the TMI. This padded seat works great to keep my bottom comfortable on my return flight. I didn’t have any flare ups and was unbothered the entire flight. I’m so happy to have a seat cushion that I can easily carry around for any other activities that I may need a padded seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good size, very soft
reviews.reviewText: Cushion on my ikea office chair wore out after years of use, this cushion is the perfect solution. It stays put and doesn’t slide. Only downside is the chemical/new car smell but I’m sure that’ll fade with time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product and Service absolutely Great!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many chair cushions that all have had very high prices without finding even one that worked for me. I was getting desperate so I looked one more time to see if i could find another one to try. I ended up finding this one but the price was so low that I hesitated to buy it, but I did.I could not have been more surprised to find it was absolutely perfect for me! This chair cushion is great and gets mi highest recommendation!!
